title: Daily Ankle Stability on Foam Pad
description: Physical-therapy protocol to strengthen ankles, Achilles, and improve proprioception/balance. Uses an oval foam balance pad. 5 rounds of slight-knee-bend single-leg balance (30s each leg), followed by 1-minute static holds on each leg.

activities.name: Right Leg - Slight Knee Bend
activities.notes: Stand on oval foam pad, one leg, knee bent ~30-45°, hold balance. Keep core engaged, slight knee flexion. Do not go too deep.

activities.name: Left Leg - Slight Knee Bend
activities.notes: Stand on oval foam pad, one leg, knee bent ~30-45°, hold balance. Keep core engaged, slight knee flexion. Do not go too deep.

activities.name: Right Leg - Static Hold
activities.notes: Stand on oval foam pad, one leg, knee straight or very slight bend, hold steady balance for full minute.

activities.name: Left Leg - Static Hold
activities.notes: Stand on oval foam pad, one leg, knee straight or very slight bend, hold steady balance for full minute.
